conditions.name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
conditions.suggestion: CRITICAL: Early treatment prevents joint damage. Common tablets: Methotrexate (7.5-20mg weekly) - MUST take with folic acid (1mg daily), Sulfasalazine (500-1000mg twice daily). For pain: NSAIDs like Naproxen (500mg) or Celecoxib (200mg). ALERT: Regular blood monitoring required. Physical therapy crucial for joint protection.

conditions.name: Osteoarthritis
conditions.suggestion: WARNING: Protect joints from injury. Common tablets: Acetaminophen (650-1000mg every 6 hours), NSAIDs - Ibuprofen (400-800mg) or Meloxicam (7.5-15mg daily). Supplements: Glucosamine (1500mg) with Chondroitin (1200mg). IMPORTANT: Weight management crucial for joint health.

conditions.name: Fibromyalgia
conditions.suggestion: REMEMBER: Pain management is multi-faceted. Common tablets: Duloxetine (30-60mg daily), Pregabalin (75-150mg twice daily), Amitriptyline (10-25mg at bedtime) for sleep/pain. IMPORTANT: Regular gentle exercise essential. Stress management key to symptom control.

conditions.name: Osteoporosis
conditions.suggestion: CAUTION: Fall prevention critical. Common tablets: Alendronate (70mg weekly) - take on empty stomach, Calcium (1000-1200mg daily), Vitamin D3 (1000-2000 IU daily). WARNING: Report any new pain immediately. Weight-bearing exercises important for bone strength.

conditions.name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
conditions.suggestion: ALERT: Early intervention prevents nerve damage. Common tablets: NSAIDs - Naproxen (500mg twice daily) or Ibuprofen (400mg), Gabapentin (100-300mg) for nerve pain. Vitamin B6 (50-100mg daily). ESSENTIAL: Proper ergonomics and wrist positioning at work.
